title: Many Democrats Back Kamala Harris In 2024 But Nancy Pelosi, Others Silent

title: "Will Do Everything In My Power...": Kamala Harris Vows To Defeat Trump
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris praised President Joe Biden's "patriotic" decision not to seek reelection Sunday and vowed to win the Democratic nomination and defeat Donald Trump.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris praised President Joe Biden's "patriotic" decision not to seek reelection Sunday and vowed to win the Democratic nomination and defeat Donald Trump.

title: From Kamala Harris To Josh Shapiro: Who Will Replace Biden In 2024 Race?
content: Joe Biden's withdrawal from the race for the White House leaves a gap atop the Democratic presidential ticket that the party is now rushing to fill.

title: List Of 36 Democrats In US Congress Who Publicly Called On Biden To Quit
content: Thirty-six congressional Democrats have publicly called on Democratic President Joe Biden to end his re-election bid after the 81-year-old incumbent's halting debate performance against Republican rival Donald Trump.

title: Clintons Praise Biden's "Extraordinary Career Of Service", Endorse Harris
content: Former president Bill Clinton and ex-secretary of state Hillary Clinton praised Joe Biden's decision to abandon his White House reelection bid Sunday, and threw their support behind Vice President Kamala Harris to take up the baton.
summary: Former president Bill Clinton and ex-secretary of state Hillary Clinton praised Joe Biden's decision to abandon his White House reelection bid Sunday, and threw their support behind Vice President Kamala Harris to take up the baton.

title: "Crooked Biden Was Not Fit To Run For President": Donald Trump
content: Former president Donald Trump on Sunday reacted to Joe Biden ending his reelection bid, claiming the incumbent president is "certainly not fit to serve."

title: Netanyahu To Send Team For New Talks To Free Hostages Held In Gaza
content: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced Sunday that a negotiating team would be sent this week for new talks on a deal to free hostages held by operatives in Gaza.

title: Joe Biden: Stubborn President Who Fought A Battle Too Far
content: Joe Biden wanted to save the "soul of America" from Donald Trump, but his stubborn defiance of the march of time may have cleared his rival's path back to power.
summary: Joe Biden wanted to save the "soul of America" from Donald Trump, but his stubborn defiance of the march of time may have cleared his rival's path back to power.

title: Kamala Harris, Trailblazer Eying America's Last Glass Ceiling
content: For years Kamala Harris faced criticism that she was not up to the job of being a heartbeat away from the presidency. Now, she finds herself feted by Democrats as their best hope to stop Donald Trump's comeback.
summary: For years Kamala Harris faced criticism that she was not up to the job of being a heartbeat away from the presidency. Now, she finds herself feted by Democrats as their best hope to stop Donald Trump's comeback.

title: The Biden Bombshell: A Plot Twist That Roils Trump Too
content: Joe Biden's withdrawal upends what was already a White House race for the ages, but it will rattle Donald Trump, too -- forcing him to recalibrate a campaign that was focused almost entirely on his former opponent.
summary: Joe Biden's withdrawal upends what was already a White House race for the ages, but it will rattle Donald Trump, too -- forcing him to recalibrate a campaign that was focused almost entirely on his former opponent.

title: Pendulum Swung To Republican Party: Elon Musk's Jab After Biden Announcement

title: Jill Biden's 'Heart' Response To Husband's Move To Quit Presidential Race
content: US President Joe Biden has announced that he is stepping out of the pesidential race slated for later this year. To this announcement, Joe Biden's wife Jill Biden had a no-word response, just a heart emoji.

title: Explained: Joe Biden Won't Run For Re-Election. What Happens Next?

title: Biden Abruptly Changed His Mind About 2024 Race Over Weekend: Report
content: President Joe Biden as of Saturday night had planned to stay in the 2024 presidential race, but told senior staff on Sunday afternoon that he was withdrawing, a source familiar with the matter said.
summary: President Joe Biden as of Saturday night had planned to stay in the 2024 presidential race, but told senior staff on Sunday afternoon that he was withdrawing, a source familiar with the matter said.

title: Trump Says Kamala Harris Will Be Easier To Defeat, After Joe Biden Quits
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Sunday he thinks Vice President Kamala Harris will be easier to defeat in November's election than Democratic President Joe Biden, who earlier in the day stepped aside as his party's candidate.

title: The Final Days: How Biden And His Inner Circle Blew It
content: Joe Biden's decision to end his reelection campaign on Sunday followed a series of strategic missteps by his campaign team and White House aides that amplified concerns that the 81-year-old president wouldn't be able to win in November's election.

title: Joe Biden Won't Contest US Presidential Polls: Full Text Of Announcement

title: "In Best Interest...": Biden Bows Out Of US Presidential Race
